reviews.review_msg: POL 428 - I have taken three classes with Professor McGovern during my time at SFU. Honestly, she was one of my favourite professors. She is very approachable outside of class and is clear with her criteria. She also cares about her students. Her seminars are engaging, but she is a harder grader. Overall, I would take her class again!

Clare is one of my favourite professors in the department. She is super approachable and genuinely cares about students success. She is excellent at facilitating class discussions, which makes the class go by fast. Just make an effort and follow the criteria and youll do well.
